characters: Driver of a red car, motorcyclist, pedestrian, white sedan, black SUV
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through a busy urban intersection. The red car ahead is moving slowly, while a motorcyclist is seen on the right side. A pedestrian suddenly appears from the left side, crossing the road. A white sedan is seen moving from the right side to the left side of the intersection. Towards the end, a black SUV cuts in from the right side, moving into the self-vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a slow speed due to the busy intersection and the presence of multiple moving objects. The vehicle is likely preparing to brake or stop due to the pedestrian crossing and the black SUV cutting in from the right side.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red car, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right side: A motorcyclist, approximately 10 meters away, moving forward. 3) Left side: A pedestrian, approximately 8 meters away, crossing the road. 4) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 15 meters away, moving from right to left. 5) Right side: A black SUV, approximately 3 meters away, cutting into the self-vehicles lane.
